adHeader: SPECIAL BUY 5 TIMES TREATMENT GET 1 TIMES FREE Hair Removal by Laser
adDetails: Welcome to Anna Beauty Care If you don't want the hair on your body then Laser may be your best treatment option. I have invested in some of the latest laser equipment available to bring you the best service available. In just 6 Laser sessions I can remove about 80% of your unwanted hair without pain or discomfort and without the need of using numbing products. Face Laser (single session) $ 100 Full Legs Laser (single session) $ 200 Half Legs Laser (single session) $ 120 Full Arms Laser (single session) $ 120 Under Arms Laser (single session) $ 50 Brazilian Laser for Men (single session) $ 90 Brazilian Laser for Women (single session) $ 70 Back, chest or Stomach Laser (single session) $ 200 Prepay any 5 of the same treatments and get 1 additional treatment Free. Please call Anna for an Appointment at: show contact info Open 7 days a week from 9 am to 9 pm Anna's Beauty Care is located in South San Jose, close to Chynoweth Avenue on Derek Drive. Anna only answers calls from a valid phone number and does not accept calls from "blocked" numbers. Please remember to "unblock" your number when you call. Thank You.
